Metadata.Title: Parsing of External XML Entities Is Disabled
Metadata.DirectLink: Parsing of External XML Entities Is Disabled

Content.Data:
==What to Check For==
Verify that parsing of external XML entities is disabled.
==Why==
Parsing external entities in XML documents may result in injection vulnerabilities.
==How to Check==
==How to Fix==
There are multiple parsing packages built into the Android SDK: //SAXParser//, //XmlPullParser// and //DocumentBuilder//.
//DocumentBuilder// doesn't support external XML entities.
//XmlPullParser// doesn't support external XML entities.
//SAXParser// has parsing of external XML entities disabled by default. Parsing of external XML entities is configured in //SAXParser// using //external-general-entities// and //external-parameter-entities// feature flags. Please, make sure that these flags are not enabled by the application.
==Related Items==
* For more information about Android XML parsers, please see http://developer.android.com/reference/javax/xml/parsers/package-summary.html * For a full list of feature flags supported by the SAX XML parser, please see: http://sax.sourceforge.net/apidoc/org/xml/sax/package-summary.html#package_description * For more information about the //SAX2// parser, please see http://developer.android.com/reference/org/xml/sax/package-summary.html * For more information about the //XmlPullParser// class, please see http://developer.android.com/reference/org/xmlpull/v1/XmlPullParser.html
